mapper.select: SELECT user.id id, login, password, firstName, lastName, patronymic, email, address, phone FROM user JOIN patient p ON user.id = p.userId WHERE userId = #{id};

SELECT title, c.name room, date, time, doctorId, firstName doctorFirstName, lastName doctorLastName, patronymic doctorPatronymic, ds.name speciality FROM schedule_cell JOIN time_cell tc ON schedule_cell.id = tc.scheduleCellId JOIN doctor d ON schedule_cell.doctorId = d.userId JOIN doctor_specialty ds ON d.specialtyId = ds.id JOIN cabinet c ON d.cabinetId = c.id JOIN user u ON d.userId = u.id WHERE patientId = #{patientId};

SELECT title, name room, date, time, patientId, duration, doctorId FROM medical_commission mc JOIN commission_doctor cd ON mc.title = cd.commissionTicket JOIN cabinet c ON mc.cabinetId = c.id WHERE patientId = #{patientId} ORDER BY date, time;;
